trialPopup.title: Trial status

trialPopup.trialExpired: Your trial expired, please click on the Upgrade button to continue using the platform.
trialPopup.alreadyUpgraded: Welcome back to your trial. You have already requested an upgrade for your account, you will be notified via email when the upgrade is active!

trial.noCreditCard: Please try to upgrade again once you filled your credit card information...

successUpgrade.content: Once your order is processed, you will receive instructions via email on how to sign into your new account. If you have any questions in the meantime, please contact sales@2600hz.com and someone will assist you.
successUpgrade.title: Thank you for your order!

success.reset: An email has been sent to the address you provided. Please check that email for temporary credentials that you can use to access your account. Once signed in, you will need to change/update your password.

reset.username: The username provided could not be found

error.missing: Please input either an account name or a phone number linked to your account

trialGreetingsDialog.content: The step-by-step wizard will help familiarize you with the platform so that you can begin setting up your business phone system.

oauth.noLinkMsg: We didn't find any account linked to this email address. To link your accounts together, please login to the platform with your usual credentials. You won't need to do that again.

retryLoginConfirmText: You have been disconnected from the system. Do you want to try to reconnect?
__comment: UI-2921: adding way to impersonate a user
confirmUserMasquerading: Are you sure you want to impersonate the following user: "{{userName}}"? Doing so will reload the UI entirely and you will have to sign out in order to get back to your original account. Proceed anyway?
